    #include<iostream>
    #include<cstdio>
    #include<cstdlib>

    int uni(int num){
    int u=num;
    u=num%10;
    u=(u*num)%10;
    u=(u*num)%10;
    u=(u*num)%10;
    return u;
    }
    int main(){
    int i,num,x;
    char c[10];
    int temp;
    while ( scanf("%s",c) && c[0]!='#'){
    temp=4;
    num=atoi(c);
    for(i=4;i<=num;i++){
    x=uni(i);
    temp=(temp+x)%10;
    }
    printf("%d\n",temp);
    }

    return 0;
    }
